descriptionHtml:
Endorse when you like it please

The Dragon priest inn exists out of 6 rooms: a main room, a hall, two bedrooms, a basement and a resting place for the for poor people in the basement.

There are a few nice surprises inside and outside. Outside on the chopping block you\'ll find a mysterious note that leads you to a pleasant surprise and on the inside there is a hidden treasure with quit alot value.

This is my absolute fist mod, i have never modden any elder scroll games. It took about 60 hours to develop this mod. But I have played Morrowind, Oblivion and of course Skyrim.

I hope you like it. I would really apreciate your comments and criticism. If you would like to see something added to te inn just tell me and i\'ll see what i can do.

change log

version 1.2
- fixed the issue with changing values of all steel ingots in the game (it should be fine now)

version 1.1
- added a glow to the snowball hands
- added more people to the inn
- added a stable outside
- added a crop field outside
- fixed the blue loading screen when you leave the inn
- updated the hallway
- added a firemage near the axes
- made the basement feel less empty
- minor fixes to the outside

check my other mods:
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=17797
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=14669

(i\'m sorry for all the grammatical faults because I do not speak English)
author: Marnix Mohrmann
